price: Yeroo "Rabbiin sodaadhu" isaan jedhame of tuulummaan badiitti isa kakaasa. Ga’aan Isaa jahannami, Afanni (jahannam ta’uun) waa fokkate!
arabic: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُ ٱتَّقِ ٱللَّهَ أَخَذَتۡهُ ٱلۡعِزَّةُ بِٱلۡإِثۡمِۚ فَحَسۡبُهُۥ جَهَنَّمُۖ وَلَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā qīla lahu ittaqi al-laha akhadhathu al-ʿizatu bil-ith'mi faḥasbuhu jahannamu walabi'sa al-mihādu
